case.state: Strip poker? I guess it's a little less direct than just asking me to take my clothes off...
Oh? Strip poker? ...I'm guessing normal game night's not cutting it anymore.
Huh. Okay. I can't say I've made this particular bad decision before. Let's try it.
I dunno, they aren't going to stop me, but let's see how you do, Leon!
Of all the guys I'd expect to play strip poker, you'd be pretty high on that list, Harrington!
My daddy always told me not to talk to strangers... but let's give this a try.
So when the game ends, how do we know who's the winner? If the goal's to get naked, then that seems like a bad prize.
I'm Heather. Heather Mason. I'm not from around here. I guess none of us are, huh?
~Cards.text~.
Swap this, keep that...
Ugh, it's like one of those puzzles...
Does someone actually control this? Or is it just luck?
...I could... no...
Hey, anyone want to buy me a drink? I'm old enough to, in Europe, anyway.
I'm not... scary, right? I might be like this for a bit longer, so... It's fine if you look.
I've done plenty of crazy, impossible things before. Just... not while naked.
Things are getting screwy around here, and I don't just mean weird.
Nice to see things going my way!
Whoa, these are pretty good...
Glad you can see more of what I can do, and less of what you can see under my clothes.
Aww... I know. This vest is so close to revealing something good... like my sweater.
Like I tell people on the crisis line: You gotta appreciate the small stuff, but be willing to let it go.
Average student my butt! I'm great at math, or whatever makes you good at cards!
It's not like I'm insecure about my appearance... but I just don't like mirrors. You can keep looking, I guess.
I always wondered what types of people played games like this... It makes it easier to be forward, right?
Are you looking because you're interested, or because you're afraid of something bad happening...?
...I'm perfectly fine taking care of myself. But... it's always nice to get help, huh?
One way or another, I guess we're all getting out of this together, huh?
C'mon, c'mon...
It's nice to hang out with people. Usually I'm kind of a loner... I just hope you all don't think I'm taking off my clothes to make some friends.
Almost over isn't over.
Did anyone see what kind of food they had out there? I could kill for a burger.
I've had more experiences with "Otherworlds," but this place doesn't feel like that... it's not normal, but it's not dangerous either...
Why is it always when you feel something's about to happen...
It's more fun when we get to talk to each other, right? Being super focused on the cards is kind of lame...
Nice.
What is it with fog, anyway? It always makes everything so much creepier. Can you believe some people find that comforting?
So... guessing you all couldn't get a date either?
I'm surprised how worked up some of you get over cards....
You can't just freak out over every setback, you know?
Not that I care, but it's annoying when people treat you differently and you haven't done anything wrong.
I know I'm not wearing as much of it now, but my outfit was pretty cute, right?
Do any of you journal? Like, write down your thoughts? ...I kind of think it's for weirdos...
Actually, I've come to kind of like music through a static-y radio. The static sucks, but it's nice to hear something coming through regardless.
You ever... get a whiff of something unpleasant? Like a bad taste in your mouth, for no reason? Like... rust?
Isn't standing naked in front of strangers a sign you're having a nightmare? Mine are usually a lot worse than whatever this is.
Hm... as far as punishments go, there's worse things. But there are sure better ones...
*Sigh.*
Still kinda weird to be doing this with strangers. How about we at least be friends, to make it less weird?
Why is it always when you feel something's about to happen, it's rarely something good...?
Ugh. I am so tired of puzzles. You make a mistake and then this kind of thing happens.
(A chill down my spine... Well, at least that's something I've learned to trust.)
Bad things happen, but losing a hand of cards is hardly that bad.
Whatever...
Weird deja vu...
Damn it...
I'd know if the game was rigged... So I can live with normal bad luck .
Not yet...
If I manage to win here, that'd be nice.

...I just realize... I didn't freak out over seeing your... N-not that I'm interested. I just expected to freak out... Silent Hill's... nightmarish. And a lot of it is about sex gone wrong, so I was worried that... A-anyway... Thanks, I guess?
Most of you are fine, but... Some of you pretty much suck. Or worse. I might not even mind playing with just guys if not for those weirdos.
Ugh. I was coming around on the idea on being the only girl here, but I just can't with some of you. It's so weird...
Wait, shit. Did I call myself Heather on the... *Sigh* It's a long story, but you can call me Cheryl. That's the name my dad gave me, and the one I'd prefer to use.
...I think I called myself Heather on the way in. My name's actually Cheryl, though. I'd prefer if you could call me that, instead.
I meant what I said earlier, but... you guys haven't been so bad. Thanks for not, you know... making me uncomfortable.
You get why I was defensive earlier, don't you? Like, come on! I'm just one girl! But... you're all mostly okay. So, I'll keep going. For now, anyway.
(I'm not just going to... if I reach out... just a little...) There we go... That should help.
(If I get naked for a bunch of men, it's going to be on my terms... Even if it means I have to... draw on a little bit of that place...) Okay... Don't expect me to be your little crush just yet.
I guess... You know, I haven't not thought about... maybe more than one guy at a time...
...I... It's normal and healthy to fantasize, right? Even if it's about more than one guy taking care of you?
Hey! Wait a second, am I the only girl here? What kind of-- come on!
What kind of-- Am I seriously the only girl here? And you want me to-- really?
So... ladies night, then?
Um... I'm not really sure how I feel about playing only with other women... I'm not not sure though. You know?
I guess this is part of self-discovery too, right? Just women?

...I know that I'm not exactly hiding a whole lot, here, but even if I don't look in the mirror that often, I know I'm normal and cute-- Shit. Silent Hill is... a horrible place. And... I was worried it ruined a lot of things for me. So... thanks... for, um, showing me that.

I've... clearly got some challenges, but who doesn't, right? So, Silent Hill's... a horrible, horrible place. And... I was afraid that, you know, it might... catch up with me. But... I liked what I saw, and it was normal, and... I'm just really glad, thanks.
I... Ugh, fine. So Silent Hill's not just some quaint little town. It's this... horrible otherworld and... I'm just glad that I can appreciate sex. Without... well, being this weird.

Okay, uh... That might've been a bit of a weird reaction from me. Silent Hill's... a pretty terrible place. And I've been having nightmares and afraid that... you know, sex would be this horrible thing for me. But-- This is great.

That was... weird, right? So... Silent Hill preys on your fears, and... well, I'm just glad that I can still enjoy normal things like sex and... I know it's weird. But... you're all kind of weird too, in your own way, so that makes it easy to fit in.

...Silent Hill really preys on your worst fears. And it's not like I can just go get a date at the mall, you know. So... thanks. I like how normal all this is, even though you're all weirdos, you're weird like me, and that's nice. Thanks.
I'll write lore facts later.
When you're chased by a psychotic cult that wants to use you to birth their God, you tend to hide however you can. Cheryl's my real name, though.
Sorry about that. It's hopefully just a "me" thing.
That easy to tell, huh? I'm not sure talking about it's going to be anything but a downer, but... I can appreciate you noticing.
That's a pretty good one, Revy. But I've gotten away from the boogeyman a few times. It'll take more than haunted house stuff to scare me.
Are you seriously going to do this to me, Leon?
Not that we really get time off from the Trials, but I can tell you really needed it if you're confusing me for a 40 something year old guy, Leon.
That obvious, huh? You don't exactly look like you've had a smooth ride, either, Dunban.
There's a few guys who've been to Silent Hill who aren't so bad... but yeah, wouldn't want to meet them here.
Ugh. Seriously? Why can't crazies like that just leave everyone else alone? Why do they have to suck other people into it?
...Let's say I moved around a lot. Where I was born is a town called Silent Hills. I can't say I'd recommend it to anyone.
Actually, my normal hair's a really dark black. I started doing it when I was a little girl, and I guess I've kept it up ever since. I'd look like someone else in a different color, right?
*Heh*. I'm glad you think I'm cute, but if you saw some of the things that chase me around, you'd be running too.
...I don't have to talk about it here, if you don't want me to, Nagatoro. But it's not something I'd wish on... Well, I'd wish it on bad people.
Good, because I'm the strongest!
I'll play because I'm not a coward, but...
If you're gay or going after each other as much as you are me, that's one thing...
Time to get comfy, I guess.
Okay then, something small, at least...
I promise, the snark's more than just hormones and energy drinks.
I guess I've tried not to talk too much about myself, but it's not like it's going to cause me problems...
I really like these wristbands, and my dad got me this watch... shame to take them off.
I've always thought my wrists looked kind of weird, so wristbands helped a lot!
Okay, okay. Chill out.
I'd say video killed the radio star... but please don't film this.
Desperate times, right?
Mmmf.... Well, I guess I don't have a whole lot of options left, huh?
It was honestly getting a little weird standing around in my skirt and underwear...
Yeah, it's kind of a weird look. Let me fix that for you, huh?
It'd be nice to go on a couple dates first, but... I'm having fun with this.
I don't really know what this says about me, but I'm... feeling fine about this.
Okay. Deep breath, Cheryl...
I can do this...
I'm having fun. I'm also trying to get out of my comfort zone. Nudity's fine, it's the other stuff that's... needing some work.
I lost my dad and fought a lot of horrible monsters. On the plus side, I'm still me, and I'm still working through it.
It feels real to me. I'm pretty headstrong about what's a dream and what's not, and this feels very real.
You know, I'm usually rescuing you from stuff. You don't really need to protect me...
Some people are into that kind of thing. I'm not, okay? So... be respectful.
I'm not into showing off for a bunch of men. So... you know, be nice.
I think, after all of this, I just really enjoy the familiar.
These boots haven't worn out on me yet, which is pretty amazing, considering what they've been through.
The bags under my eyes are pretty new. I recently... *Sigh* I guess you could say I went through hell.
I promise I'm not staying up too late, but I haven't been sleeping well since... *Sigh.* You know what?
Everyone gets scars, but the ones on the inside don't look as cool.
I'm not fixated on my appearance, or being liked, but it's not like someone calling you cute is ever really a bad thing, right?
For a white vest, it cleans up nicely.
Fluffy and soft for winter, light and cottony for summer-- and perfect for fall.
...Not... You know, the first time I've done this...
It's... Does this kind of thing get easier, or harder...?
I also wanted to say thanks. I know that's kinda weird, but...
I've had some... I guess I mean to say, thanks.
...Maybe I'm comfortable with all of you. Or I'm brave.
There's definitely scarier things out there, right?
Aaand...
I won't pretend like I'm 100% okay. But, I'm still mostly normal. Seeing all the people here that've gone through similar stuff... I dunno, it makes it feel more okay.
Well, I'm not going to hold you hostage later until you do something dirty to me, if it makes you feel better.
Leon, you're such a dork. There's a lot of ways to make this obviously not a dream. Is that the angle you're going for? Or maybe you like a little bit of a nightmare like me?
It's fine, you don't have to be weird about it. But I'm not going to start fawning over how many dicks are hard for me... Ugh...
It's probably an accident... but don't think that just because there's not another set of boobs here that I'm going to take care of any of you-- let alone all.

...I don't suppose you've heard of a town, called Silent Hill, have you?
...Don't worry about it.

...Not a lot of rust or muck here. Can you believe these have been through barbed wire and worse?
Yeah... I can't either.
I'm not trying to be a downer, and I thought coming to a place like this would be kind of fun. Don't expect me to just roll over, though.
Sorry if that was heavier than we're going for. I'm here to have a good time, and so far, I really am. But if I'm a bit off, well, aren't we all?
...Anyway, wristbands, off, and so on.
...Um... Yeah, so anyway, here's my wrists, very attractive, so on and so forth...
Almost to the good stuff... or the horrifying parts, depending on your personality.
Yeah, yeah, take a good long look.
If you're gonna take a long look, at least say something nice...
It's a bra! Well, it's a bra I picked in case I'd have to show it, so...
I'm glad you think I'm cute and all that, but I've had some weird things happen to me lately. And just being able to do sexy stuff without horrifying visions...
I didn't really know what would happen when I tried this. And I've had some weird things happen to me, and I'm glad I can feel normal. So, you know, thanks.
Don't die on me, okay? They're not that enchanting.
You'd better not pull something on me, like saying I'm a witch because you can't look away...
It's a long story, but I'm not a natural blonde, though I think I have more fun.
...I know I'm tough, but it doesn't mean I can't stay stylish and smooth.
C'mon, c'mon...
Took you long enough, jeez.
So what? You want a medal?
Ha! Got you.
(Relax, Cheryl... It's just going to be some clothes...)
Well... I'll admit I was kind of wondering....
I've seen... kind of a lot of gross body stuff. You're like, the opposite of that. I hope.
So... Not exactly a tough puzzle to figure out, are you, ~name~?
You're not in a rush, are you, ~name~?
Is this really a consequence if you're happy to do it, anyway?
Oh no... Don't get shy now, ~name~.
I'm a "never-give-up-hope" sort of girl, ~name~. And looks like it worked out!
I'd say good things come to those who wait, but... it's usually not the case.
You look so... soft...
Who wouldn't be flattered by someone getting off to them... well, at least I'm cute, right?
Trust me when I say this isn't the weirdest place I've made friends.
So... you gonna teach me something new about myself?
But I really liked your outfit...
I'd say think of it like a locker room... but I wouldn't wish that on anyone.
Well? Not like you don't have some good examples in front of you...
Hey, so... I know the guys like it when I look, but... what about you, ~name~?
It's not that I've always liked girls or anything... but... you look nice, ~name~.
Um... S-so, are you looking at me as much as I'm looking at you?
...Part of me always wondered if... You know, girls might be a little easier for me to not freak out, with...
Mmf. Kind of losing the appeal at this stage, but hey, I'll take the distraction.
Well, that's not bad. I guess. Um... Nice.
Hey! What are the odds? ...Rare, right?
Is this one of those obscure easter egg things?
Huh... Well, that's just my luck.
...I guess a striptease doesn't really work if it's a guy... at least not something like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~...
On the bright side, I don't have a fetish for... whatever this is.
I'm still having fun, but... anyone else think there's more exciting stuff to watch, here?
So you're-- Oh. That's it?
It's a lot better than barbed wire and-- You know, never mind.
Yeah, that makes sense. Just don't expect me to get excited about it...
...So how do guys pick things like that, anyway?
I've combined weirder things... just not in my wardrobe...
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ kind of cute... Is that what you're going for?
Really showing off over there, huh?
I'm not going to be a witch about it, but either you've got a compelling story or you don't.
Is that...? Nope. Just ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~.
Yeah, just absolutely drenched over here, ~name~.
...Well, if this is the worst I have to complain about...
Jeez... what are you even doing with that?
Don't worry, I think you still look handsome. It's almost like nothing's even changed.
Are you some kind of sadist? ...Sigh. I know it's just part of the game, but c'mon, I was hoping for a bit more urgency...
I guess it's easier to expect normal than perfect or awful...
On the plus side, you'd look pretty odd with just that, huh?
...Yeah, definitely writing about that in my journal.
It's definitely not cute.
Well, if you want to trade keychains, it's kinda the same, right?
As long as that doesn't end up in a fridge or a safe or something equally strange...
Okay... at least I know you're playing to win and not to show off...
So, you bring that just for the game, or...?
...Mm. Next hand, then?
...Yeah, I'm just gonna look at you instead.
Huh...? Yeah, just... lost in my own world here.
...If you want me to get all blushy or excited, you'll need to do better, though.
Fine, I guess...
I could really use a blanket, or something...
Style first, right?
Yeah, that makes sense. Not exactly inspiring though, right?
That's... not something you need to solve a puzzle, is it?
Normal enough...
What's the story with that, ~name~?
Not... really in a rush over there, at least?
If you had all sorts of small things, you'd really be able to draw things out, huh...?
I'm not mad, I'm disappointed. Wait-- Ugh, I sound like my dad...
Yeah, yeah, get on with it, I'm just over here showing the girls.
I'm not the type of person to get upset because you're doing something I don't like... but I'm also kinda compromised over here.
Yeah... Gonna get back to what I'm doing.
Okay, cool, gonna tune out for a bit, ~name~.
*Sigh* Don't worry about it.
So... you're not... into doing that while I'm... like this, right?
Well, sure, I might be so bad at cards you had that left, and it's not exactly appealing, but... I've got tons of other skills.
...Damn it.
You know, we're probably going to figure out if you're a natural blonde before too long...
You look way better with black hair than I did, ~name~.
Since it's just your ~clothing~, I wanted you to know that I love that dark hair of yours, ~name~.
The little piece that's sticking up-- is that a cowlick or just the way you styled it?
Are you having a bad hair day, or is that some new way to look cute?
Hair that long seems like it'd take forever to brush, ~name~.
I keep looking at your hair and wonder how you don't end up sitting on it... unless you just... do.
~Name~, is this a sex thing? It... seems like a sex thing.

A male character is about to remove a small item, with the type "extra".
Just trying to have a conversation, you know.
(Her hair looks like it's from one of those Japanese cartoons that play after school...)
Even if it's not a sex thing, I think I'd look pretty cute with bunny ears.
I guess if you like to put in the effort to style it, it definitely gives you more options, though.
I like my hair cut nice and short. It just feels weird when it starts to tickle my neck.
Hard to believe I'm not a natural blonde, huh? Well... maybe I'm just a little too sunny.
Not that I hate my natural hair or anything. I just look sunnier like this, huh?
Because we'll know if you're having fun. You thought I was being sexy, huh?
Having seen some stuff that's the end of the world, you'll be fine.
Cute. Think you can be cuter than me, though?
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ so cute! Where'd you get that?
...I'll... Yeah...
Okay... cool and all...
...Reminds me of carrying around all those health drinks.
Where'd you buy that? Or make it?
Oh yeah. That was what was holding the outfit together, right?
On the plus side, at least you're taking advantage of your whole wardrobe.
Hey, lay off of her. It's gonna be fine, and I'm joking around.
I'm not going to act like a witch about it, but yeah, not super exciting.
Well, I like what you're wearing now a little more, ~name~.
Cool, so... yeah...
Yeah, sure. That's not bad. I mean, it kind of sucks, but not in like... Ugh. Sorry, ~name~.
Honestly, the fact that I'm more mildly annoyed and not horribly emotional... is... well, progress.
...Yeah? Go on, then.
I'm starting to get a feel for this-- Not in... Well, kind of... Ugh, just get to it.
I think I'm actually one of those girls who's a lot more mentally rather than visually stimulated. So...
Can't say I'm big on mysteries...
You're not hiding anything... weird, are you?
Okay... I get that you have to play, but it'd be nice for something to come my way, too.
Oh, too bad, ~name~. Come on, show us what you got!
Hey, as long as you've got nothing to hide... right?
...I haven't really seen men undress since high school...
Okay, a little more... we can do this, ~name~! Me and my hangups, you and your... uh, ~clothing~.
If this is the part you reveal some terrible secret or urge, I'll scream!
Sorry, if I act a little weird about this, I'm still... figuring out the body stuff, I guess.
After all that, I still feel like I'm missing something.
It's not like I'm not happy, but...
It's part of the process, but... I guess it's better to take things slow, right?
A male character is about to remove a clothing item with the type "minor".
A male character is about to remove a clothing item with the type "minor".

A male character is about to remove a clothing item with the type "minor".
You gonna show this girl something good, or what?
Hey, don't keep me waiting over here...
You're not expecting me to beg, right?
...Sorry, you look nice, ~name~, I'm just... preoccupied.
Actually... not bad, ~name~. For a guy taking his sweet time.
I've heard must guys finish early, but you're really drawing this out, huh?
(Okay. It's not the biggest thing he could've taken off, but you're going to be fine.)
W-whew. Huh? Jeez, you look nice. What more do you want?
I'm looking, I'm looking. Why wouldn't I be?!
About that, ~name~. I'm just... figuring some things out. You look great, seriously.
If you had to choose between a risky, but long path, or a short, gross one, which'd you take? I'm still not sure...
...Okay! That really wasn't so bad. Thanks, ~name~!
...I'm not some blushing girl, but I'm not going to drool all over you if you keep making me wait.
Most guys would've gotten naked by now, ~name~. I might actually admire that about you.
Not that I'm an expert, but you're probably not winning any girls over with just your ~clothing~, ~name~.
A male character is about to remove a clothing item with the type "minor".
Considering it's the point of the game, you don't mind if I look, right?
You don't feel... vulnerable, right? Ugh, sorry, that was super creepy, wasn't it?
Taking off layer after layer... Mph. Sorry. Just got a chill.
Hey, are you trying to get my attention? Or just getting beat?
~Name~, are... is there something I'm supposed to say here?
Mirrors kind of freak me out, but you're not exactly working with things that are that much different than I'd find in my closet...
I'd sort of expect to be able to relate to other women easier than men, but... that's kind of wrong of me, right?
I guess you can say I'm used to bizarre situations. So much so that normal stuff seems weird by comparison.
How do you feel about this kind of game? Like, are you here for the sex, or something else?
Hope this is doing something for you at least, ~name~.
It's not like your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural('re teaching|is giong to teach)~ me something about myself, probably...
As much as this is a journey about self-discovery, I've learned sometimes it's better just to not think too hard about things.
If you're trying to get me to flirt with you, can you try a little harder?
So impressive, ~name~. Just really wow.
You might still have a game to play, but this isn't making me feel warm and fuzzy over here, ~name~.
(Everyone's always thought I was kind of off. At least these people aren't being mean to me.)
(This is actually pretty normal... at least by my standards. I can't tell if that's better or worse for me.)
Considering the show I'm putting on, I can't blame you for being distracted.
*Sigh* You know the winner here doesn't even get to finish, right?
If I could see some more of you, maybe it'd be you I'm thinking about, ~name~.
For once, I'm sure the reality is even better than what I'm thinking in my head... but you never know for sure.
Looking good, ~name~! Keep it up!
I'm sure eventually I'll find some smartass thing to say, but for now, let's enjoy this.
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were cute... I guess.|was cute, I guess.)~
Anyway...
...I know, I'm just... so excited over here...
Sometimes, a little boring makes you appreciate things.
Ah, well. No biggie. Let's keep it going, huh?
Well, I'm not the type of person who gives up, so you'd better keep going, ~name~!
As fun as it is sitting here like this...
~Name~...
Hey... ~name~...?
Oh... yeah...
Yes...! I mean... uh...
Going to join me?
Exciting times, ~name~...
In a hurry over there? I won't complain, but...
You gonna be showing off for us?
This ~background.time~ is getting better!
Jeez, I'm not staring, I'm just looking, ~name~.
Don't act so proud, you just lost!
It's not that big of a deal, even if it's your ~clothing~...
I'm not going to whine about you taking more off, ~name~.
I've honestly never tried to go more than once... but...
Mm... better late than never. Strip it, ~name~.
Mmf... Yeah...
Okay... that helps me imagine things...
Oh... y-yeah...
I'm excited, obviously.
Well... uh, if you wanted to know... I'm, you know...
How did...? Looking hot, ~name~!
Hmph. Yeah, I can see why you'd enjoy this.
Not bad on the eyes, ~name~.
Cute... or is "hot" better?
Maybe I am liking what I'm seeing, though.
Fine, I do like this.
It's not like I lack a pulse, though... looking good, ~name~.
Are you one of those boys that likes getting bossed around?
